# Zee Cine Award for Best Editing

The Zee Cine Award Best Editing is a technical award.
The winners are listed below:-
{| cellspacing="1" cellpadding="1" border="0" width="50%"
|- bgcolor="#d1e4fd"
! Year || Winner (s) || Film
|-
|2025
|Aarti Bajaj
|Amar Singh Chamkila
|-
|2020
|Nitin Baid
|Gully Boy
|-
| 2018 || Ajay Sharma || Jagga Jasoos
|-bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2014 || Arif Sheikh || D-Day
|-
| 2012 || Aarti Bajaj || Rockstar
|-bgcolor=#edf3fe
| 2008 || Amitabh Shukla || Chak De India
|-
|}
